content: UPDATE: I guess I can't edit my original message. I wanted to add that when I go into the destination folder, there's only one copy of the message and when I check the original folder, the message is no longer there (as is correct). So it seems that the saved search is slow to update. It shows the message as still existing where it was moved from but also where it has been moved to, at the same time.
creator: ThunderbirdUser23987

content: follow up on the above question I had found in setting that I had no language setting so I had to download the English dictionary and now I can check spelling and send emails. Thanks for any replies that may have come my way in the meantime. Peter
creator: nellap_a

content:
Pravdepodobne ste si vytvorili NOVÝ PROFIL Thunderbirdu. Odporúčam vrátiť sa k pôvodnému (asi Default) profilu. Na zobrazenie všetkých uložených profilov Thundrbirdu použite odkaz v ponuke Štart - Spustiť (alebo iba WIN+R) a tu vypíšte: "thunderbird -p" - bez úvodzoviek a prepnite sa do iného (pôvodného) profilu. Ak problém nepominie, tak sa môžete vrátiť k súčasnému profilu tiež príkazom "thunderbird -p http://imgbank.cz/images/2015/08/20/Thunderbird_novy_profil.jpg

Ak je problém odstránený, potom môžete ten nefunkčný profil odstrániť.
creator: Ansamb
